body:
Hi everyone.
Recently, we've seen more people using Plug.DJ, and more people wanting DJ sessions.
I have many planned out, but I can't do it alone, so I need a team to help me.
This is where you come in!
I'm looking for a team of 4-6 people to help me run Plug.DJ sessions and help organize future sessions.

Current Members:
MidnightBeats
Flufflepuff_
Tarheelkiwi
cinamoncroc000
Spartemex
CaptainDCRaven
Strafes_
99250
FrostedCupcakez
vladthegreat100

If you are interested, please apply in the format below.

IGN:
Skype:
Timezone:
Do you have a PLUG.DJ account?:
If so, what is your PLUG.DJ username?:
Are you active on the forums?
Why do you want to join?:
How could you benefit the Team?:

We would like at least 1 GMT player. You can be from any Timezone, however ;p
You will be put in a Skype chat once you are accepted, and you may apply up to two times. 

Flufflepuff_ and I will be judging your applications.

Good luck! ;p


Staff will no longer be able to apply for this team, due to balance issues.

replies.body:
Alongside Avy's retirement from the Staff Team, she has also decided to leave the Plug.DJ team. We therefore are in need of members again.

However, this time we are looking for members that are able to organize EU/AU events. It's come to the team as a whole that not enough EU/AU events are not being organized, leaving much of the community excluded from our events, or coming at unreasonable times.

You are able to apply even if you do not fit the above guideline, however, your chances will be rather low.

The application format is as follows:
Skype: (If private, please place a message in this thread so we can try to find a way to exchange communication).
Timezone:
Plug.DJ Account IGN: 
Are you active on the forums?
How would you benefit the team?

If you do not have a Plug.DJ account, know that you will be automatically denied and will not be able to re-apply until me or Skylar's consent.

replies.body:
IGN: Characteristics
Skype: PhantomiZer_Jelly
Timezone: AEST/AEDT
Do you have a PLUG.DJ account?: Yes
If so, what is your PLUG.DJ username?: Instagram | My alt is: Snapchat
Are you active on the forums? In most cases, yes.
Why do you want to join?: I'm an avid user of Plug DJ and I've been a member of 2013 so I do know most of the website well, with some sort of extensive knowledge that those who are new may not. 
I want to mainly join just to help out the Avicus players have a better experience with gameplay while being on Plug DJ. Rarely, I see anyone on the Avicus Plug DJ but since I love big events, I am ready to host events that mostly AU players can attend to, which broadens the community events.
How could you benefit the Team?:
As stated previously, I can always benefit the team by showing a high level of respect towards each and every user of Plug DJ but also hosting events that players around the Australian time zone can join in on. Although, to be fair, I may or may not attend some events due to real life events or the best ping I can get while PvPing but I should be able to be online most of the time.
I also am available nearly the whole time I'm online. I will only respond to your message if you @ me on the site but the availability comes in very handy when other staff can't help at that time.
